message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product worth $3000000. I'm confident in its exceptional quality, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long this product will be available at this price. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I'll take it, but I'm aware that there's a 20% chance it's low quality and I'll be out $1000000.

I'm intrigued by the probability-based pricing system. It seems like a fair approach, and I'm willing to take the chance on the product at this price.
